article_title: Hillary Clinton Shows Democrats Still Favor Redistribution Over Equalizing Opportunity

article_metadata.description: To reduce inequality we have two choices: redistribute income from the rich to the poor or help the poor become more productive and earn higher incomes to begin with. Here's why we should implement policies taking the second approach.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
